channel.title: Eating speed?
channel.description: i need an eating speed tut lol...because my friends server the food when eating takes like 5 seconds to eat..

item.title: Eating speed?
item.dc:creator: @Delta1 Delta1
item.description:
@Delta1 wrote:

help…this is all i see
case 391: //Manta ray
healing[1] = 40;
healing[2] = 40;
healing[3] = -1;
break;

Read full topic

item.title: Eating speed?
item.dc:creator: @icauseownage icauseownage
item.description:
@icauseownage wrote:

[quote=“fishypoo101, post:2, topic:88209”]are you trying to slow down the eating or are you trying to speed it up?

search for public void manta(){ in your client.java.
you should see something like public void manta(){ if (actionTimer == 0) { addItem(389,1); sendMessage("You catch a manta ray."); addSkillXP((1200*playerLevel[10]), 10); actionName = "make"; actionTimer = 10; pEmote = 0x306; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } } change the 0 in if (actionTimer == 0 to if (actionTimer == 5
or change ti to the speed you want.[/quote]

blind much? Thats for when you fish it. he’s trying to eat the manta.

Search for this real quick and tell me what comes up for manta

			case 391: //Manta ray

Read full topic

item.title: Eating speed?
item.dc:creator: @Xbox_Modder Xbox Modder
item.description:
@Xbox_Modder wrote:

Your wrong… The if (actionTimer == 0 at the begining is checking if the action timer is 0 you want to change the one in the middle that adds to your action times so change this one…

	actionTimer = 10;

If it is 10 I think that’s really 1 second…

Read full topic

item.title: Eating speed?
item.dc:creator: @fishypoo101 fishypoo101
item.description:
@fishypoo101 wrote:

are you trying to slow down the eating or are you trying to speed it up?

search for public void manta(){ in your client.java.
you should see something like public void manta(){ if (actionTimer == 0) { addItem(389,1); sendMessage("You catch a manta ray."); addSkillXP((1200*playerLevel[10]), 10); actionName = "make"; actionTimer = 10; pEmote = 0x306; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } } change the 0 in if (actionTimer == 0 to if (actionTimer == 5
or change ti to the speed you want.

Read full topic
